CustomField.description: Stores the batch size for the account batch job to mark partner accounts with marketing communication opt-in/out details when the value is changed on the parent reseller account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the batch size for the account batch job to mark partner accounts with marketing communication opt-in/out details when the value is changed on the parent reseller account.
CustomField.label: Mark Partner Accounts Opt Out Batch Size
